languages.text: {n}Пилот оторопело взирает на полоумную, однако упоминание династии Вольного Торговца делает свое дело. Без лишний церемоний подняв вас на ноги, он берет вас под локоть и торопится вниз, туда, где ждет шаттл.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: затемнение после куя, переход к сцене наверху

languages.text: {n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пилот оторопело взирает на полоумную, однако упоминание династии Вольного Торговца делает свое дело. Без лишний церемоний подняв вас на ноги, он берет вас под локоть и торопится вниз, туда, где ждет шаттл.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street, to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

{n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}
{n}The cyber-mastiff's lumens flash scarlet and the dog lunges at the guard. When the dog raises its bloody muzzle, the rest of the guards are long gone. The way is clear.{/n}

{n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

{n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

{n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street, to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

{n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

languages.text: {n}驾驶员看着突然窜到他面前的疯女人，目瞪口呆。不过，当你提到行商浪人王朝的时候，他所有的疑惑都烟消云散。他毫不客气地抓住了你，扯着你的胳膊，急匆匆地冲向穿梭机停靠的地方。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驾驶员看着突然窜到他面前的疯女人，目瞪口呆。不过，当你提到行商浪人王朝的时候，他所有的疑惑都烟消云散。他毫不客气地抓住了你，扯着你的胳膊，急匆匆地冲向穿梭机停靠的地方。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El piloto mira perplejo a la lunática que tiene delante, pero la mención de la dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes le saca de su estupor. Sin miramientos, te ayuda a levantarte, te agarra por el codo y corre calle abajo hasta la lanzadera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El piloto mira perplejo a la lunática que tiene delante, pero la mención de la dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes le saca de su estupor. Sin miramientos, te ayuda a levantarte, te agarra por el codo y corre calle abajo hasta la lanzadera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pilot, karşısındaki deli kadına şaşkınca bakıyor. Hür Tacir hanedanlığından bahsedilince şaşkınlığı geçiyor. Seni nezaketten yoksun bir şekilde kaldırıp kolundan tutuyor ve mekiğin beklediği yere aceleyle sürüklüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pilot, karşısındaki deli kadına şaşkınca bakıyor. Hür Tacir hanedanlığından bahsedilince şaşkınlığı geçiyor. Seni nezaketten yoksun bir şekilde kaldırıp kolundan tutuyor ve mekiğin beklediği yere aceleyle sürüklüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パイロットは目の前の狂女をぽかんと見つめたが、「ローグトレーダーの王朝」が彼の戸惑いを吹き飛ばした。彼は無造作にあなたを立ち上がらせて肘を掴み、シャトルが待つ通りへ急ぎ足で連れて行った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パイロットは目の前の狂女をぽかんと見つめたが、「ローグトレーダーの王朝」が彼の戸惑いを吹き飛ばした。彼は無造作にあなたを立ち上がらせて肘を掴み、シャトルが待つ通りへ急ぎ足で連れて行った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le pilote reste bouche bée devant la femme prise de folie qui se tient face à lui, mais se reprend à la mention de la dynastie {rt_mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Il vous remet sur pied sans ménagement, vous attrape par le bras et vous entraîne dans la rue afin de rejoindre la navette qui vous attend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le pilote reste bouche bée devant la femme prise de folie qui se tient face à lui, mais se reprend à la mention de la dynastie {rt_mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Il vous remet sur pied sans ménagement, vous attrape par le bras et vous entraîne dans la rue afin de rejoindre la navette qui vous attend.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: затемнение после куя, переход к сцене наверху

languages.text: {n}Der Pilot starrt die Wahnsinnige an, aber die Erwähnung der Dynastie {rt_mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} weckt ihn aus seiner Verblüffung. Er hilft dir unzeremoniell auf die Beine, packt dich am Ellbogen und eilt mit dir die Straße entlang zu seinem wartenden Shuttle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot gapes at the madwoman before him, but the mention of the Rogue Trader dynasty shakes him out of his bafflement. He unceremoniously pulls you to your feet, grabs your elbow, and hurries down the street with you to where the shuttle is waiting.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Pilot starrt die Wahnsinnige an, aber die Erwähnung der Dynastie {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} weckt ihn aus seiner Verblüffung. Er hilft dir unzeremoniell auf die Beine, packt dich am Ellbogen und eilt mit dir die Straße entlang zu seinem wartenden Shuttle.{/n}
